name: Card
description: A versatile card container component from shadcn/ui with header, content, and footer sections

components.name: Card
components.description: Root container element with border, rounded corners, and shadow

components.name: CardHeader
components.description: Header section with vertical spacing for title and description

components.name: CardTitle
components.description: Title heading element (h3) with prominent typography

components.name: CardDescription
components.description: Description text with muted foreground color

components.name: CardFooter
components.description: Footer section with flex layout for actions

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for customization (all components)

recommendations: Use CardTitle for main heading to maintain document outline
Consider adding role="region" and aria-label for landmark navigation
Ensure interactive elements in footer have proper focus styles

usage_examples.title: Card with Footer
usage_examples.code:
<Card>
  <CardHeader>
    <CardTitle>Create Project</CardTitle>
    <CardDescription>Deploy your new project in one-click.</CardDescription>
  </CardHeader>
  <CardContent>
    <form>
      <input placeholder="Project name" />
    </form>
  </CardContent>
  <CardFooter>
    <Button>Create</Button>
  </CardFooter>
</Card>
